benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/invoicePayments - Trigger a payment for all unpaid invoices

covered: Valid Payload scenarios: TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04, TC05, TC06, TC07, TC29
Error handling and invalid inputs: TC08, TC11-TC16, TC18-TC19, TC12, TC13, TC14, TC15, TC20-TC21
Regression and edge cases: TC28, TC25, TC26, TC23-TC24
gaps: Explicit 403 Forbidden authorization scenario not covered
Malformed JSON payload scenario not explicitly tested
Account with no default/valid payment method scenario not explicitly covered
Concurrency/race-condition tests for simultaneous requests on the same account
recommendations: Add a test for 403 Forbidden when user lacks necessary permissions
Add rate-limiting tests (e.g., multiple requests in quick succession)
Add tests with malformed JSON payload in the request body
Add scenario for account without a valid/default payment method and verify proper error handling
Add concurrency/race-condition tests for simultaneous requests on the same account
Consider adding idempotency-key related tests if the API supports idempotent submissions
